item.title: What Makes a Great Guard Tour System?
item.description: As with many industries, the contract security guard industry has to keep up with the times and that means taking advantage of the latest technology. Part of that may include finding the right guard tour system to track and report on the movement of your security officers when they are on patrol. In this article I am going to look at some detail about why you need one and what you would expect from this kind of system.
